title.rendered: Airblue Offer – Flexible Seat Option to Choose with Discounted Fare

content.rendered:
Discounted Fare for Flexible Seat Option to Choose in Airblue. Limited Time Offer

You can select the price that is right for you, with flexibility options and various baggage allowances included in your ticket price.

Baggage and Fare Options

Fare Family: Discount Standard Premium
Ticket Changes: Allowed with Higher Fee* Allowed with Standard Fee* FREE*
Ticket Refunds: Allowed with Higher Fee* Allowed with Standard Fee* Allowed with Minimal Fee*
Checked Bag Allowance: No Bags* 1 Bag* 2 Bags*
Carry On Bags: 1 Bag* 1 Bag* 1 Bag*
BlueMiles Bonus: 50% Miles Rewards 100% Miles Rewards 150% Miles Rewards
Priority Boarding: Yes
Preferred Seating: Upon Availability
Description: You like to travel light? Airblue has special fare just for you, with zero check in baggage to save you more! Exchanges and refunds are permitted, but with a slighter higher change fee.
Only a limited number of seats are available on each flight with these discounted prices.		 Expect more with Airblue. Our standard fare is better than most. One checked bag is included in the price of your ticket, and you still get the flexibility to change or refund your booking.
Enjoy the excellent airblue service you have grown to love and expect.		 You like flexibility and are unsure of your exact travel plans? Airblue now offers premium booking option that allows you to change the flights with No Change fees. What’s even better it also allows to check-in TWO checked bag at no additional charge.

About Airblue

Airblue Limited (styled as airblue) is a private Pakistani low-cost airline with its head office on the 12th floor of the Islamabad Stock Exchange (ISE) Towers in Islamabad, Pakistan. Airblue operates scheduled domestic and international flights to Oman, Saudi Arabiaand the United Arab Emirates.

View this Deal
